duties_responsibilities.duty: Plans and manages activities of a designated project(s) to ensure goals and objectives are accomplished within a prescribed time frame and within funding parameters.
Represent the company with assigned customers and responsible for maintaining customer relationships and understanding expectations.
Manage and track open issues, drive open issues to closure through tracking, delegation, and escalation.
Develop program status reports and report status to management.
Lead the coordination of technical reviews to ensure customer expectations are addressed.
Maintain master program book and coordinate APQP activities.
Manage assigned program’s product launch phases and participate in customer strategic discussions for issue resolution.
Lead coordination of manufacturing, quality, and engineering “exceptions” and/or clarification lists. Ensure all customer requirements have been addressed.
Directly support project teams (engineer, quality, sales, etc.) and follow up on related projects.
May be required to supervise the duties of others to perform the job responsibilities as designated by area/department management to ensure project success/deliverables.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or Project/Program Management
